OOC:( OK all.  It doesn't matter what someone called a character.  
It's only a character. So let's forget the mess and get back to 
having fun. *Smiles* OK, I don't care about it at all.  And I"m sure 
the rest of the group would like to not have this mess take up 
vaulable post space.  OK? Good, all are friends again. (goes back to 
having fun RPGIng)
